'''Ancient Scarlet-Plume Finch''' is a type of [[Wildlife]] that can be found in [[Natlan]]. 

It is noticeably larger than other [[finches]] and flees by hopping away instead of flying.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Ancient Scarlet-Plume Finches can be found in [[Atocpan]] and [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]].<!-- there's exactly 1 in Ancient Sacred Mountain -->

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=678 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
